title: Cruz Beckham Starts a Rock Band and Goes on Tour
summary: Cruz Beckham is the youngest son of famous parents David and Victoria Beckham. He is starting a music career as the singer in a rock band. This week, he began his first headline tour, which means he is the main performer at concerts. He played in Birmingham, and many fans came to see him. Some people know him because of his family, but others discovered his music without knowing who he was. Cruz is having fun and making feel-good music. He does not talk about family problems and focuses on his band. His music is described as ebullient and indie, and fans like it.

background_read: Cruz Beckham is part of the Beckham family, which is very famous around the world. His dad, David Beckham, was a famous football player, and his mum, Victoria Beckham, was in the Spice Girls pop group. Starting a music career can be hard, but Cruz is using his family name to get attention while also trying to show he is a good musician on his own. Many young people today use social media like TikTok to discover new music and artists.
